name: Where is Wicok
description:
You are detective Leo and you have to find your missing companion Wicok. Use your special detective color device 3000 to create forcefields that extend the black/white world to a colorful one. 

Find color clues that help you solve keypad codes, sewer mechanics and more.
Find the numbers and make sure  you count.

Controls:

WASD - move

Shift- sprint
Space - Jump

Q - Put down/Pick up your Color device 3000

E - Interact ( Color outline for interactible items/mechanics)
